events.name: Military coup in Burkina Faso
events.wd_description: The military coup in Burkina Faso deposed President Roch Kabore, prompted by demands for better security and increased instability in the region.
events.description: The military coup in Burkina Faso deposed President Roch Kabore, prompted by demands for better security and increased instability in the region.

events.name: President deposed
events.wd_description: Mutinous soldiers announced the deposition of President Roch Kabore amid demands for more support in fighting armed groups.
events.description: Mutinous soldiers announced the deposition of President Roch Kabore amid demands for more support in fighting armed groups.

events.name: t: soldier mutiny
events.wd_description: Soldiers demanded more support for their fight against armed groups and subsequently deposed President Kabore.
events.description: Soldiers demanded more support for their fight against armed groups and subsequently deposed President Kabore.

events.name: t: popular support
events.wd_description: The coup was greeted with significant support in Burkina Faso.
events.description: The coup was greeted with significant support in Burkina Faso.

events.name: t: military leadership
events.wd_description: Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damiba emerged as the leader of the coup and was named the leader of the new Patriotic Movement for Safeguard and Restoration (MPSR).
events.description: Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damiba emerged as the leader of the coup and was named the leader of the new Patriotic Movement for Safeguard and Restoration (MPSR).

events.name: rise in violence
events.wd_description: Burkina Faso has experienced a significant increase in violence from armed groups linked to al-Qaeda and ISIL.
events.description: Burkina Faso has experienced a significant increase in violence from armed groups linked to al-Qaeda and ISIL.

events.name: t: armed groups
events.wd_description: Armed groups linked to al-Qaeda and ISIL have been operating in Burkina Faso since 2015.
events.description: Armed groups linked to al-Qaeda and ISIL have been operating in Burkina Faso since 2015.

events.name: t: increased attacks
events.wd_description: The number of attacks has risen significantly, with over 1,150 incidents in 2021 compared to nearly 500 in 2020.
events.description: The number of attacks has risen significantly, with over 1,150 incidents in 2021 compared to nearly 500 in 2020.

events.name: t: civilian displacement
events.wd_description: More than 1.4 million people have been displaced by the conflict in Burkina Faso.
events.description: More than 1.4 million people have been displaced by the conflict in Burkina Faso.

events.name: international reactions
events.wd_description: The coup has sparked widespread international condemnation and prompted discussions on how to respond to the instability.
events.description: The coup has sparked widespread international condemnation and prompted discussions on how to respond to the instability.

events.name: t: international condemnation
events.wd_description: The international community, including various countries and organizations, has condemned the coup.
events.description: The international community, including various countries and organizations, has condemned the coup.

events.name: t: ECOWAS response
events.wd_description: The Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) is holding a special session to discuss the coup and potential responses.
events.description: The Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) is holding a special session to discuss the coup and potential responses.

events.name: t: potential sanctions
events.wd_description: Western allies are considering imposing sanctions on Burkina Faso in response to the coup.
events.description: Western allies are considering imposing sanctions on Burkina Faso in response to the coup.

events.name: regional instability
events.wd_description: The coup is the fourth in a series of recent military takeovers in West and Central Africa, contributing to regional instability.
events.description: The coup is the fourth in a series of recent military takeovers in West and Central Africa, contributing to regional instability.

events.name: Cyclone Batsirai Impact in Madagascar
events.wd_description: Cyclone Batsirai struck Madagascar, causing significant damage, displacing thousands, and killing at least ten people, while the country was still recovering from Cyclone Ana.
events.description: Cyclone Batsirai struck Madagascar, causing significant damage, displacing thousands, and killing at least ten people, while the country was still recovering from Cyclone Ana.

events.name: Cyclone Batsirai
events.wd_description: Cyclone Batsirai hit Madagascar's eastern shoreline, causing widespread destruction and displacing 43,000 people.
events.description: Cyclone Batsirai hit Madagascar's eastern shoreline, causing widespread destruction and displacing 43,000 people.

events.name: Displacement and Damage
events.wd_description: The cyclone killed at least ten people and displaced 43,000, with many towns and villages destroyed, and infrastructure severely impacted.
events.description: The cyclone killed at least ten people and displaced 43,000, with many towns and villages destroyed, and infrastructure severely impacted.

events.name: Emergency Response
events.wd_description: Emergency responders faced challenges accessing affected areas, while disaster relief agencies provided basic necessities to displaced individuals in temporary shelters.
events.description: Emergency responders faced challenges accessing affected areas, while disaster relief agencies provided basic necessities to displaced individuals in temporary shelters.

events.name: Landslide in Petrópolis, Brazil
events.wd_description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.
events.description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.

events.name: Landslide
events.wd_description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.
events.description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.

events.name: Search and Rescue Operations
events.wd_description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.
events.description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.

events.name: Government Response
events.wd_description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.
events.description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.

events.name: China EV Battery Industry Overview
events.wd_description: A comprehensive overview of China's EV battery industry as reported by DIGITIMES Asia, highlighting the market growth, key players, government policies, and technological advancements in the context of global EV market leadership.
events.description: A comprehensive overview of China's EV battery industry as reported by DIGITIMES Asia, highlighting the market growth, key players, government policies, and technological advancements in the context of global EV market leadership.

events.name: Market Growth and Dominance
events.wd_description: China has the world's largest EV market, with 3.3 million EV sales in 2021, a 168% growth from 2020, and accounts for more than 50% of global EV battery usage.
events.description: China has the world's largest EV market, with 3.3 million EV sales in 2021, a 168% growth from 2020, and accounts for more than 50% of global EV battery usage.

events.name: t: Sales Growth
events.wd_description: China saw the sale of 3.3 million EVs in 2021, reflecting a 168% growth from 2020, highlighting the rapid expansion of the EV market.
events.description: China saw the sale of 3.3 million EVs in 2021, reflecting a 168% growth from 2020, highlighting the rapid expansion of the EV market.

events.name: t: Global Battery Usage
events.wd_description: China accounted for more than 50% of the global EV battery usage in 2021, with 296.8 GWh of global usage reported by SNE Research.
events.description: China accounted for more than 50% of the global EV battery usage in 2021, with 296.8 GWh of global usage reported by SNE Research.

events.name: Key Battery Manufacturers
events.wd_description: Six out of the top 10 battery makers are based in China or owned by Chinese companies, including the world-leading CATL.
events.description: Six out of the top 10 battery makers are based in China or owned by Chinese companies, including the world-leading CATL.

events.name: t: CATL
events.wd_description: CATL is the world-leading EV battery maker, significantly contributing to China's dominance in the global battery market.
events.description: CATL is the world-leading EV battery maker, significantly contributing to China's dominance in the global battery market.

events.name: t: Other Chinese Battery Makers
events.wd_description: Other top Chinese battery makers include companies that are expanding their production capacity to meet the growing demand.
events.description: Other top Chinese battery makers include companies that are expanding their production capacity to meet the growing demand.

events.name: Government Policies and Impact
events.wd_description: Government subsidies and policies significantly influence the EV and battery manufacturing industry in China, driving expansion and securing raw materials.
events.description: Government subsidies and policies significantly influence the EV and battery manufacturing industry in China, driving expansion and securing raw materials.

events.name: t: Subsidies and Policies
events.wd_description: Government subsidies and policies have been crucial in shaping the EV and battery manufacturing industry in China.
events.description: Government subsidies and policies have been crucial in shaping the EV and battery manufacturing industry in China.

events.name: t: Securing Raw Materials
events.wd_description: Material suppliers like Huayou Cobalt and Beijing Easpring Material Technology have nickel mining projects in Indonesia to secure the necessary raw materials.
events.description: Material suppliers like Huayou Cobalt and Beijing Easpring Material Technology have nickel mining projects in Indonesia to secure the necessary raw materials.

events.name: Technological Advancements and Safety Features
events.wd_description: Chinese battery companies are focusing on safety features in their products, with advancements in heat-resisting technologies to prevent fire accidents.
events.description: Chinese battery companies are focusing on safety features in their products, with advancements in heat-resisting technologies to prevent fire accidents.

events.name: t: Safety Features
events.wd_description: Companies like GAC Aion and BYD have showcased battery technologies with enhanced heat-resisting ability to address safety concerns.
events.description: Companies like GAC Aion and BYD have showcased battery technologies with enhanced heat-resisting ability to address safety concerns.

events.name: t: Technological Advancements
events.wd_description: Technological advancements in battery design are being implemented to enhance safety and performance in EV batteries.
events.description: Technological advancements in battery design are being implemented to enhance safety and performance in EV batteries.

events.name: Battery Recycling Ecosystem
events.wd_description: China is developing its EV battery recycling ecosystem to ensure a stable supply of raw materials and reduce dependence on other nations.
events.description: China is developing its EV battery recycling ecosystem to ensure a stable supply of raw materials and reduce dependence on other nations.

events.name: t: Prominent Recyclers
events.wd_description: Prominent recyclers like GEM and Brunp Recycling are leading the development of the EV battery recycling ecosystem in China.
events.description: Prominent recyclers like GEM and Brunp Recycling are leading the development of the EV battery recycling ecosystem in China.

events.name: t: Government Policies on Recycling
events.wd_description: Government policies are expected to guide the development of the battery recycling business in China.
events.description: Government policies are expected to guide the development of the battery recycling business in China.
